changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE osontop.categories ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(), name_uz VARCHAR(255), name_ru VARCHAR(255), name_en VARCHAR(255), description_uz TEXT, description_ru TEXT, description_en TEXT, image VARCHAR(255), icon VARCHAR(255), parent_id UUID, order_index INT DEFAULT 0, created_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, deleted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, version BIGINT DEFAULT 0, CONSTRAINT fk_categories_parent_id FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES osontop.categories (id) );
